item.title: Cant add items to shops..help!
item.dc:creator: @mista_pnut mista pnut
item.description:
@mista_pnut wrote:

I’m guessing that there is already a shop with the number 8, because there is in the original delta source.

Try changing the number to something like 72, make sure to change it in your client class and your shop config file.

Read full topic

item.title: Cant add items to shops..help!
item.dc:creator: @bobby11 bobby1
item.description:
@bobby11 wrote:

Well title says all this is what i did. BTW THIS IS A CAMALOT PVP SOURCE…

went to client file searched wannashop found a npc i liked this is the code
} else if (NPCID == 2620) {
// Hur-Tel
PutNPCCoords = true;
WanneShop = 8; // TzHaar pk Store

now i want to autospawn put in
spawn = 2620 2730 3491 0 0 0 0 0 1
got the npc

now i went to shops i put in

Shop = 8 TzHaar pk Store 1 1 544 30000 542 30000 373 30000 379 30000 1163 30000 1147 30000 1185 30000 1201 30000 1261 30000 1259 30000 1319 30000 1333 30000 1331 30000 2615 30000 2614 30000 2615 30000 2617 30000 2619 30000
and none of these items show up..i added 1 other shop and that had worked fine please help!
